participant_1.background:
I am a champion at tae kwan do.
I have never been away from the state i live in.
I like rollercoasters.
My dad taches tae kwan do.
I am an 12 year old girl.

participant_2.background:
My favorite past time is collecting civil war antiques.
I have an allergy to mangoes.
I have been married four times and widowed three.
I fake a british accent to seem more attractive.
I am an eccentric hair stylist for dogs.

content.text: Hi! I'm participant_1!
Hello participant_2! I'm participant_2!
Nice to meet you participant_1! What do you do for fun?
I'm an eccentric hair stylist for dogs, and I collect civil war antiques.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to be a dog groomer.
It's a lot of fun! I love getting to make dogs look and feel their best.
What's your favorite thing about your job?
I love getting to meet new dogs and their owners. I also love making people happy.
That's so sweet! I'm sure your clients love you.
They do! I've been lucky enough to have a lot of great clients over the years.
That's awesome! What's your favorite civil war antique?
I have a really cool musket that I found at a flea market. It's in great condition and I love the history behind it.
That sounds amazing! I'm not really a history buff, but I can still appreciate a good antique.
I'm sure you would! There's something really special about holding a piece of history in your hands.
I'm sure you're right! I'm glad you're so passionate about your work.
Thank you! I love what I do.
I can tell! It's clear that you take pride in your work.
I try my best! I want my clients to be happy with my work.
I'm sure they are! You seem like a great person to work with.
Thank you! I try to be. I always want my clients to have a positive experience.
I'm sure they do! You seem like a very nice person.
